# This is Tianqi Li's website
Hi, I am a second year MPH student majored in biostatistics with a certificate in
comparative effectiveness outcomes research (CEOR).I am passionate about using 
statistical methods to improve healthcare outcomes and inform decision-making. 
My work focuses on biostatistics applications in public health.

If you'd like to learn more about me, visit [this page](resume.html) or click
on the "Resume" button on the upper right corner of the page. You can 
also find quick links to my email and GitHub profile there.
